table.name: vtiger_training
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_training` ( `trainingid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `subject` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`trainingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_trainingcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_trainingcf` ( `trainingid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`trainingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
